import React, { Component, useEffect } from "react"; import * as customer from "../CutomerList/CustomerList.style"; import ButtonText from "../../../components/ButtonText/ButtonText"; import allActions from "../../../action/customer"; import { FaPen, FaTrashAlt,FaSearch } from "react-icons/fa"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import {useDispatch,useSelector} from 'react-redux' const CustomerList = ()=>{ const customer = useSelector(state=>state.employees) return (
{/* */} Add Customer
Customers{" "} {customer && customer.length} First Name Last Name Email Phone Address Company Action {customer && customer.map((item, index) => ( <> {item.fname} {item.lname} {item.email} {item.phone} {item.address} {item.company}    {" "} this.deleteCustomer(item.id)} /> ))}
); } export default CustomerList
